verses.verse: And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>

Speak <S%H1696><s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> that they <S%H7725>turn<s%> and <S%H2583>encamp<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H6367>Pi-hahiroth,<s%> <S%H996>between<s%> <S%H4024>Migdol<s%> and the <S%H3220>sea,<s%> over <S%H6440>against<s%> <S%H1189>Baal-zephon:<s%> <S%H5226>before<s%> it shall ye <S%H2583>encamp<s%> <S%H5921>by<s%> the <S%H3220>sea.<s%>

For <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%> will <S%H559>say<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H1992>They<s%> are <S%H943>entangled<s%> in the <S%H776>land,<s%> the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%> hath shut them <S%H5462>in.<s%> <S%H5921><s%>

And I will <S%H2388>harden<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H6547>Pharaoh's<s%> <S%H3820>heart,<s%> that he shall <S%H7291>follow<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> them; and I will be <S%H3513>honored<s%> upon <S%H6547>Pharaoh,<s%> and upon <S%H3605>all<s%> his <S%H2428>host;<s%> that the <S%H4714>Egyptians<s%> may <S%H3045>know<s%> <S%H3588>that<s%> <S%H589>I<s%> am the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%> And they <S%H6213>did<s%> <S%H3651>so.<s%>

And it was <S%H5046>told<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> <S%H3588>that<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H1272>fled:<s%> and the <S%H3824>heart<s%> of <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%> and of his <S%H5650>servants<s%> was <S%H2015>turned<s%> <S%H413>against<s%> the <S%H5971>people,<s%> and they <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H4100>Why<s%> have we <S%H6213>done<s%> <S%H2063>this,<s%> <S%H3588>that<s%> we have <S%H853>let<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H7971>go<s%> from <S%H4480>serving<s%> <S%H5647><s%> us?
And he made <S%H631>ready<s%> <S%H853><s%> his <S%H7393>chariot,<s%> and <S%H3947>took<s%> his <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H5973>with<s%> him:

And he <S%H3947>took<s%> <S%H8337>six<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H977>chosen<s%> <S%H7393>chariots,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H7393>chariots<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> and <S%H7991>captains<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> every <S%H3605>one<s%> of them.

And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H2388>hardened<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H3820>heart<s%> of <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> and he <S%H7291>pursued<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel:<s%> and the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> went <S%H3318>out<s%> with a <S%H7311>high<s%> <S%H3027>hand.<s%>

But the <S%H4714>Egyptians<s%> <S%H7291>pursued<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> them, <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5483>horses<s%> and <S%H7393>chariots<s%> of <S%H6547>Pharaoh,<s%> and his <S%H6571>horsemen,<s%> and his <S%H2428>army,<s%> and <S%H5381>overtook<s%> them <S%H2583>encamping<s%> <S%H5921>by<s%> the <S%H3220>sea,<s%> <S%H5921>beside<s%> <S%H6367>Pi-hahiroth,<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H1189>Baal-zephon.<s%>

And when <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%> drew <S%H7126>nigh,<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> lifted <S%H5375>up<s%> <S%H853><s%> their <S%H5869>eyes,<s%> and, <S%H2009>behold,<s%> the <S%H4714>Egyptians<s%> <S%H5265>marched<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> them; and they were <S%H3966>sore<s%> <S%H3372>afraid:<s%> and the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> cried <S%H6817>out<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>

And they <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> <S%H4480>Because<s%> <S%H1097><s%> there were <S%H369>no<s%> <S%H6913>graves<s%> in <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> hast thou taken us <S%H3947>away<s%> to <S%H4191>die<s%> in the <S%H4057>wilderness?<s%> <S%H4100>wherefore<s%> hast thou <S%H6213>dealt<s%> <S%H2063>thus<s%> with us, to carry us <S%H3318>forth<s%> out of <S%H4480>Egypt?<s%> <S%H4714><s%>

Is <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> the <S%H1697>word<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> we did <S%H1696>tell<s%> <S%H413><s%> thee in <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> Let us <S%H2308>alone,<s%> <S%H4480><s%> that we may <S%H5647>serve<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H4714>Egyptians?<s%> <S%H3588>For<s%> it had been <S%H2896>better<s%> for us to <S%H5647>serve<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H4714>Egyptians,<s%> than that we should <S%H4480>die<s%> <S%H4191><s%> in the <S%H4057>wilderness.<s%>

And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> the <S%H5971>people,<s%> <S%H3372>Fear<s%> ye <S%H408>not,<s%> stand <S%H3320>still,<s%> and <S%H7200>see<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H3444>salvation<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> he will <S%H6213>show<s%> to you <S%H3117>today:<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H4714>Egyptians<s%> <S%H834>whom<s%> ye have <S%H7200>seen<s%> <S%H3117>today,<s%> ye shall <S%H7200>see<s%> them <S%H5750>again<s%> <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H3254>more<s%> <S%H5921>forever.<s%> <S%H5769><s%>
The <S%H3068>LORD<s%> shall <S%H3898>fight<s%> for you, and <S%H859>ye<s%> shall hold your <S%H2790>peace.<s%>

And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> <S%H4100>Wherefore<s%> <S%H6817>criest<s%> thou <S%H413>unto<s%> me? <S%H1696>speak<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> that they go forward: <S%H5265><s%>

But lift thou <S%H7311>up<s%> <S%H859><s%> <S%H853><s%> thy <S%H4294>rod,<s%> and stretch <S%H5186>out<s%> <S%H853><s%> thine <S%H3027>hand<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> the <S%H3220>sea,<s%> and <S%H1234>divide<s%> it: and the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> shall <S%H935>go<s%> on <S%H3004>dry<s%> ground through the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of the <S%H3220>sea.<s%>

And <S%H589>I,<s%> <S%H2009>behold,<s%> I will <S%H2388>harden<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H3820>hearts<s%> of the <S%H4714>Egyptians,<s%> and they shall <S%H935>follow<s%> <S%H310><s%> them: and I will get me <S%H3513>honor<s%> upon <S%H6547>Pharaoh,<s%> and upon <S%H3605>all<s%> his <S%H2428>host,<s%> upon his <S%H7393>chariots,<s%> and upon his <S%H6571>horsemen.<s%>

And the <S%H4714>Egyptians<s%> shall <S%H3045>know<s%> <S%H3588>that<s%> <S%H589>I<s%> am the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> when I have gotten me <S%H3513>honor<s%> upon <S%H6547>Pharaoh,<s%> upon his <S%H7393>chariots,<s%> and upon his <S%H6571>horsemen.<s%>

And the <S%H4397>angel<s%> of <S%H430>God,<s%> which <S%H1980>went<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H4264>camp<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H5265>removed<s%> and <S%H1980>went<s%> <S%H4480>behind<s%> <S%H310><s%> them; and the <S%H5982>pillar<s%> of the <S%H6051>cloud<s%> <S%H5265>went<s%> from before their <S%H4480>face,<s%> <S%H6440><s%> and <S%H5975>stood<s%> <S%H4480>behind<s%> <S%H310><s%> them:

And it <S%H935>came<s%> <S%H996>between<s%> the <S%H4264>camp<s%> of the <S%H4714>Egyptians<s%> and the <S%H4264>camp<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel;<s%> and it <S%H1961>was<s%> a <S%H6051>cloud<s%> and <S%H2822>darkness<s%> to them, but it gave <S%H215>light<s%> <S%H853><s%> by <S%H3915>night<s%> to these: so that the <S%H2088>one<s%> came not <S%H7126>near<s%> <S%H3808><s%> the <S%H2088>other<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H3915>night.<s%>

And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> stretched <S%H5186>out<s%> <S%H853><s%> his <S%H3027>hand<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> the <S%H3220>sea;<s%> and the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H853>caused<s%> the <S%H3220>sea<s%> to <S%H1980>go<s%> back by a <S%H5794>strong<s%> <S%H6921>east<s%> <S%H7307>wind<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> that <S%H3915>night,<s%> and <S%H7760>made<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H3220>sea<s%> <S%H2724>dry<s%> land, and the <S%H4325>waters<s%> were <S%H1234>divided.<s%>

And the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H935>went<s%> into the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of the <S%H3220>sea<s%> upon the <S%H3004>dry<s%> ground: and the <S%H4325>waters<s%> were a <S%H2346>wall<s%> unto them on their right <S%H4480>hand,<s%> <S%H3225><s%> and on their <S%H4480>left.<s%> <S%H8040><s%>

And the <S%H4714>Egyptians<s%> <S%H7291>pursued,<s%> and went <S%H935>in<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> them <S%H413>to<s%> the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of the <S%H3220>sea,<s%> even <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H6547>Pharaoh's<s%> <S%H5483>horses,<s%> his <S%H7393>chariots,<s%> and his <S%H6571>horsemen.<s%>

And it came to <S%H1961>pass,<s%> that in the <S%H1242>morning<s%> <S%H821>watch<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H8259>looked<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> the <S%H4264>host<s%> of the <S%H4714>Egyptians<s%> through the <S%H5982>pillar<s%> of <S%H784>fire<s%> and of the <S%H6051>cloud,<s%> and <S%H2000>troubled<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H4264>host<s%> of the <S%H4714>Egyptians,<s%>

And took <S%H5493>off<s%> <S%H853><s%> their <S%H4818>chariot<s%> <S%H212>wheels,<s%> that they <S%H5090>drove<s%> them <S%H3517>heavily:<s%> so that the <S%H4714>Egyptians<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> Let us <S%H5127>flee<s%> from the <S%H4480>face<s%> <S%H6440><s%> of <S%H3478>Israel;<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H3898>fighteth<s%> for them against the <S%H4714>Egyptians.<s%>

And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> Stretch <S%H5186>out<s%> <S%H853><s%> thine <S%H3027>hand<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> the <S%H3220>sea,<s%> that the <S%H4325>waters<s%> may come <S%H7725>again<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> the <S%H4714>Egyptians,<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> their <S%H7393>chariots,<s%> and <S%H5921>upon<s%> their <S%H6571>horsemen.<s%>

And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> stretched <S%H5186>forth<s%> <S%H853><s%> his <S%H3027>hand<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> the <S%H3220>sea,<s%> and the <S%H3220>sea<s%> <S%H7725>returned<s%> to his <S%H386>strength<s%> when the <S%H1242>morning<s%> <S%H6437>appeared;<s%> and the <S%H4714>Egyptians<s%> <S%H5127>fled<s%> <S%H7125>against<s%> it; and the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H5287>overthrew<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H4714>Egyptians<s%> in the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of the <S%H3220>sea.<s%>

And the <S%H4325>waters<s%> <S%H7725>returned,<s%> and <S%H3680>covered<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H7393>chariots,<s%> and the <S%H6571>horsemen,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H2428>host<s%> of <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%> that <S%H935>came<s%> into the <S%H3220>sea<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> them; there <S%H7604>remained<s%> <S%H3808>not<s%> so much <S%H5704>as<s%> <S%H259>one<s%> of them.

But the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H1980>walked<s%> upon <S%H3004>dry<s%> land in the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of the <S%H3220>sea;<s%> and the <S%H4325>waters<s%> were a <S%H2346>wall<s%> unto them on their right <S%H4480>hand,<s%> <S%H3225><s%> and on their <S%H4480>left.<s%> <S%H8040><s%>

Thus the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H3467>saved<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H1931>that<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> out of the <S%H4480>hand<s%> <S%H3027><s%> of the <S%H4714>Egyptians;<s%> and <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H7200>saw<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H4714>Egyptians<s%> <S%H4191>dead<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> the <S%H3220>sea<s%> <S%H8193>shore.<s%>

And <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H7200>saw<s%> <S%H853><s%> that <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H3027>work<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H6213>did<s%> upon the <S%H4714>Egyptians:<s%> and the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H3372>feared<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> and <S%H539>believed<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> and his <S%H5650>servant<s%> <S%H4872>Moses.<s%>
